SEARCH
Package troops

Class Mage

java.lang.Object
troops.Troop
troops.Mage
@Entity public class Mage extends Troop
The class for the Mage troop extending the Troop class. This class contains the various statistics for the Mage troop, which other classes can use for fights and power calculations.
